resources.name: Anki Core Vocabulary Decks
resources.description: Popular frequency-based vocabulary decks for Anki.
resources.descriptionLong: The Core 2k/6k/10k Anki decks contain the most frequently used Japanese words with example sentences and audio. These decks are highly effective for building vocabulary using spaced repetition. Start with Core 2k and progress from there.
resources.notes: Core 2k is a great starting point. Progress to 6k and 10k.

resources.name: WaniKani Vocabulary
resources.description: Vocabulary learning integrated with kanji study.
resources.descriptionLong: WaniKani teaches vocabulary alongside kanji, ensuring you learn words that use the kanji you've studied. This integrated approach helps reinforce kanji readings through practical vocabulary.
resources.notes: Vocabulary is taught in context with kanji.

resources.name: jpdb Vocabulary
resources.description: Learn vocabulary from your favorite media.
resources.descriptionLong: jpdb provides vocabulary lists based on specific anime, visual novels, light novels, and other media. Study the words you'll encounter before consuming content, making immersion more effective.
resources.notes: Great for preparing to consume specific Japanese media.

resources.name: JLPT Vocabulary Lists
resources.descriptionLong: Various resources provide vocabulary lists organized by JLPT level. These lists help you focus on the words most likely to appear on your target JLPT exam and track your vocabulary progress.
resources.notes: Lists available for all JLPT levels.

resources.name: Renshuu Vocabulary
resources.description: Vocabulary practice with games and community.
resources.descriptionLong: Renshuu offers vocabulary practice through various study modes and games. The platform includes JLPT vocabulary, custom lists, and community features. Great for making vocabulary study more engaging.

resources.name: Takoboto Dictionary
resources.description: Dictionary with vocabulary lists and flashcards.
resources.descriptionLong: Takoboto is a comprehensive Japanese dictionary that includes vocabulary list features and built-in flashcards. Save words you look up and review them using the app's study features.

resources.name: Memrise Japanese
resources.description: Vocabulary learning with video clips of native speakers.
resources.descriptionLong: Memrise teaches Japanese vocabulary using video clips of native speakers. The platform uses spaced repetition and various exercise types to help you remember words. Good for learning pronunciation alongside vocabulary.
resources.priceDetails: Free tier available. Pro subscription for full access.

resources.name: Torii SRS
resources.description: Free vocabulary SRS app with Core 10k words.
resources.descriptionLong: Torii SRS is a free application for learning Japanese vocabulary using spaced repetition. It includes the Core 10k vocabulary list and allows you to exclude words you already know from WaniKani or other sources.
resources.notes: Free alternative to paid vocabulary apps.

resources.name: Kitsun.io
resources.description: SRS platform with community-created vocabulary decks.
resources.descriptionLong: Kitsun.io is an SRS platform with a library of community-created vocabulary decks. The platform offers a polished interface and various study modes. Good alternative to Anki with a more modern design.
resources.notes: Modern SRS platform with good community decks.

resources.name: Japanese Core 1000
resources.descriptionLong: Learning the 1000 most common Japanese words gives you coverage of a large percentage of everyday Japanese. Various resources provide this core vocabulary with example sentences and audio.
resources.notes: Focus on the most common words first.
